column1: Varigence's premier offerings, BimlStudio and BimlFlex are being updated to feature overwhelming parity with the powerful Microsoft Azure Data Factory. Find out more:

Newÿfeature:ÿWhenÿcopyingÿdataÿfromÿaÿsource,ÿusersÿmayÿspecifyÿexplicitÿschemaÿmapping,ÿallowingÿtheÿabilityÿtoÿcustomizeÿmappingsÿbasedÿonÿtheÿneedsÿofÿyourÿorganization. BimlStudio can now harness the power to create more efficient copies between sources and sinks.

Newÿfeature:ÿMappingÿdataflowsÿisÿaÿvisualÿdepictionÿofÿdataÿtransformationsÿwithoutÿhavingÿtoÿwriteÿanyÿcode. BimlStudio has been optimized to support ADF's data flows, including code translation, path optimization, and execution of routine data flow tasks.

Ifÿyou'veÿbeenÿusingÿBimlExpress,ÿnowÿisÿtheÿbestÿtimeÿtoÿupgradeÿtoÿBimlStudio! The 2020 R2 rollout has numerous updates that increase functionality with Azure Data Factory. Ask for a demo or Proof of Concept today!

Now is the best time to ask for a demo or Proof of Concept for BimlStudio or BimlFlex. With the 2020 R2 rollout, there are more features than ever to automate your data warehouse solution and save money today.
